text: The women's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Yuna Mekhti-Zade Kseniya Vdovina Natalya Murinovich Yuliya Chermoshanskaya ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Anne-Kathrin Elbe Verena Sailer Mareike Peters Anne Möllinger ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Paulina Siemieniako Ewelina Klocek Marta Jeschke Iwona Brzezińska ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
